channel.title: LF AI RSS
channel.description: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

item.title: Briefing with LLM on Tue, 08 Aug 2023 11:04:22
item.description:
Wayne Brady is currently hiring a Software Engineer for Etleap, a company that participated in the Y Combinator program in 2013. The position is available in either London or San Francisco.

In the field of medical research, a recent study has discovered that malignant melanoma, a type of skin cancer, utilizes a sophisticated molecular mechanism to evade immune responses. This finding sheds light on the complex nature of cancer and may contribute to the development of more effective treatments in the future.

Grammarly, an AI-powered writing assistant, requires businesses with 500 or more users to have a business account in order to opt out of its AI training program. This policy highlights the importance of large-scale data collection for improving AI algorithms.

In the entertainment industry, there has been a surge in popularity for celebrity concerts. This raises questions about who is profiting from these events and who may be facing financial losses.

The coffee industry is experiencing competition as Chinese coffee chain, Luckin Coffee, surpasses Starbucks in market share. This development may have caught Starbucks off guard and could potentially impact its business strategy.

Oladance, a dance company, has successfully raised millions of dollars in angel funding. With a projected revenue of over 1 billion yuan by 2024, Oladance is poised for significant growth in the coming years.

In the world of JavaScript programming, mastering shorthand techniques such as ternary operators, array methods, and object properties can greatly enhance a developer's efficiency and productivity.

In the real estate sector, Huawei, a Chinese technology company, has established a real estate subsidiary. Additionally, Aosuogena, a property technology company, has secured millions of dollars in pre-Series A funding. These developments reflect the ongoing innovation and investment in the real estate industry.

Lanmao Technology, a company specializing in enterprise automation operations, has raised tens of millions of yuan in Series A funding. Their focus on developing large-scale models demonstrates the growing importance of automation in business operations.

Japan's approach to reducing interest rates on existing housing loans, which amounted to 38 trillion yuan, provides insights into potential strategies for managing similar situations in other countries.

The A-share market in China has experienced a collective decline, with the securities and automobile sectors leading the way. This decline may be influenced by various factors, including market sentiment and economic conditions.

The People's Bank of China has conducted a 7-day reverse repurchase operation worth 6 billion yuan. This move by the central bank aims to manage liquidity in the financial system.

Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index has opened with a 1.17% decline, while the Hang Seng Tech Index has dropped by 1.89%. These fluctuations in the stock market reflect the volatility and uncertainty in the current economic climate.

GoerTek, a technology company, has responded to rumors regarding a large order from Huawei for their Starshine earphones. The company has refrained from commenting on the matter, indicating the sensitivity of the issue.

The Chinese yuan has been adjusted by 15 basis points against the US dollar on August 8th.

Zhongde Technology, a company specializing in chip packaging, has raised millions of yuan in angel funding. This investment will support their research and development of temperature control boards for chip packaging.

Datablau, a company focused on data governance, has completed its Series B1 funding round. Their exploration of AI models in core business scenarios demonstrates the potential for AI in data management.

CITIC Securities believes that the valuation of the military industry sector is currently at a low point and recommends increasing investment in this sector.

Overall, these news highlights various developments in technology, medical research, entertainment, finance, and real estate. Each topic provides insights into the current trends and challenges faced by different industries.
